sections.summary: resourceful and accomplished office manager with extensive office operations and personnel organization expertise.versatile office manager capable of managing dynamic and cross-functional teams as well as projects. over 10 years of progressive experience in business management and the legal arena. highlights interpersonal skills: works independently, technical skills: typing (70 wpm), dictaphone, transcription, speed writing, handles pressure well, meets deadlines, casenet, proficiency in microsoft word (95 through word 2007), microsoft proficient managerial skills, effective team word perfect, excel, outlook, access, powerpoint, timeslips, quikbooks, leader and efficient team player, excellent other miscellaneous programs, calendaring, travel arrangements, itineraries, customer service skills, exemplary work ethic, proficient in using the â€œtickle systemâ€​ for legal and corporate matters, filing, multi-tasks, plans and organizes individual and fax machine, copiers, travel arrangements, e-filing, multi-line telephone corporate meetings, excellent written and verbal systems. data entry (superior), minutes of meetings, a/p - a/r communication skills
sections.skills: legal experience (10+ years): administrative law, corporate law, ip, contractual law, bankruptcy law (debtor's rights: chapter 7 and 13), workers' compensation law. domestic/family law, estate planning, personal injury, medical malpractice, plaintiff and defendant work, creditor and debtors' rights accomplishments increased office organization by developing more efficient filing system and customer database protocols.planned and executed all aspects of a major office headquarter move.developed and implemented company's first employee manual outlining all proper business procedures and office policies.
